job.title: Associate Data Engineer
job.description: Job DescriptionÂ As an Associate Data Engineer,Â you will be successful if you excel at designing and building reporting and analytic solutions from complex and dynamic benefits administration data. You will support other Technology and Product Team members, along with team members from the Customer Success departments, to analyze patterns, visualize data in effective ways, and support client data requests. You have a natural curiosity to hypothesize and have the desire and ability to be a go-getter and try to look for the answers in data in different ways. You are not satisfied understanding the issues, instead preferring to take action, communicate your recommendations effectively and drive change using data. Working in a fast-paced environment, managing through uncertainty, and networking across Vimly teams to weave the right data picture are challenges that energize you. If you are drawn to the opportunity to re-imagine benefits administration and deliver innovation come join us.Â Job Responsibilities:Enable and support other Vimly team members by developing powerful and insightful reporting that will help guide the businessIntegrate qualitative analysis of data with the quantitative method of report-buildingWilling and able to use low-code solutions for developing features.Participates in operational tasks bringing a DevOps mindset.Able to fully complete tasks that are generally a smaller feature, or piece of the system.Self-starter and able to work under the guidance of more senior team members.Work closely with other members of the Vimly team to create ad-hoc reports to support timely business decisions, service evaluation, and any project workAbility to communicate complex quantitative analysis in a clear, precise, and actionableExcel at making complex concepts simple and easy to understand by those around youParticipate in stakeholder
